channel.title: Trouble with modding XML files (Divine PK Server)
channel.description:
Hi All,
I'm having trouble with the server XML files on the Divine PK v5 release. The server runs perfectly thanks to the help guide posted on the forum, but the trouble comes with step 2 (modding stats and items). I have followed the guide over and over, yet when rebooting the server to see the new changes i have made(e.g killing a chicken drops a party hat or a steel 2h is more powerful than dragon when equipped) nothing happens and it retains the old value. Am i missing something?
PS, keep up the good work with this community, its so good to see RSC back

item.title: Trouble with modding XML files (Divine PK Server)
item.dc:creator: @Stashah Stashah
item.description:
@Stashah wrote:

You must uncompress them first, by simply extracting the *.xml files into same folder. Then edit it, right after that delete old file and compress the new file.
I suggest gzip, download it from: http://www.gzip.org/gz124src.zip
Install it, then right click the *.xml file, “open with->Choose Program…”, then click Browse and find the gzip.exe on your HDD. Now just select it, click “ok” and it’s done.

Read full topic
item.source: Trouble with modding XML files (Divine PK Server)
